member.name: eAVDecDDStereoDownMixMode
member.summary: Specifies the stereo downmix mode for a Dolby Digital audio decoder. This enumeration is used with the CODECAPI_AVDecDDStereoDownMixMode property.

member.name: eAVDecDDStereoDownMixMode.eAVDecDDStereoDownMixMode_Auto
member.summary: The decoder selects the mode automatically.
